name: Preach Despair (Harbinger of Things to Come)

ZDM5640rjND5wbqH.name: Preach Despair (Harbinger of Things to Come)

system.description: A hostile creature within 60 feet of you suffers a level of strife. Creatures with an opposite alignment from yours or that worship a greater entity that has an opposite alignment suffer two levels of strife instead. A creature cannot suffer more than two levels of strife from Preach Despair in the same 24 hours.
